Details: Gear- Net: 70' semi-balloon, Foot rope: bobbin and roller, Doors: 3.5 x 8.5 ft wood Late april, early May 30 minute 50 - 200 m  Loran A CCGS G.B Reed Large fish removed from catch dumped on deck and weight estimated (e.g., dogfish, turbot).
